name: Infinite Race
description:
Do you like fast cars racing games?
Get ready to compete in one of the most challenging racing games that you’ve encountered!

The game offers amazing graphic and experience of speeding through crowded street.

The game is one of the best racing games that provide amazing virtual space of traffic racing! The game has been designed for people of all ages and is especially optimized for iOS devices.

Get into your high performance vehicle and accelerate to breath taking speeds on the track.Beat your opponents and become one of the greatest racing legends!

Avoid traffic accidents! Immerse yourself in the world of no-rules driving.

The graphics are absolutely amazing. The game is very addicting, it will keep you entertained for hours. It doesn't require internet connection. Play anywhere and whenever you like.

KEY FEATURES
* High-definition 3D graphics
* Smooth and realistic car handling
* Accessible and intuitive controls
* Offline Mode
